DOC.brief_summary: The goal of this study is to compare Bonglass-SS with titanum cage.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Bioactive Glass-ceramic Intervertebral Spacer (Bonglass-SS) in Posterior Lumbar Interbody Fusion
DOC.criteria: 30~80 aged patients needed singlelevel posterior Interbody fusion at L1~S1 A subject who provided written informed consent to participate in this study Patitents with BMD Tscore < 3.0 Women who are pregnant or plan to be pregnant within 3 years Patient with malignant tumor
